<title level="1" pfs="">[Stirvyn Banyan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2117)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Stirvyn Banyan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2117)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 39</row>

**Perception** +21; [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +20, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[_major mentalist's staff_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=350), [_scroll of false life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), Sheriff Banyan's map of the sea caves

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 230

**Duck Away** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Trigger** Stirvyn is targeted with an attack and is adjacent to an ally; **Effect** Stirvyn and the ally swap places, and the ally becomes the target of the attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +24 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 32, attack +24
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=174), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150), [Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Meld into Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=188), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Outcast's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=211), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Cloak of Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=41), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Prying Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=239) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots)
- **Constant (6th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)

**Sorcerer Bloodline Spells** DC 32, 3 Focus Points
- **6th**
[Ancestral Memories](/Spells.aspx?ID=493), [Arcane Countermeasure](/Spells.aspx?ID=496), [Extend Spell](/Spells.aspx?ID=507)

**Bloodline Magic**   When Stirvyn casts a bloodline spell, a surge of ancestral memories grants either him or a target of the spell a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

**Dangerous Sorcery**   When Stirvyn Casts a Spell from a spell slot, if the spell deals damage and doesn't have a duration, he gains a status bonus to that spell's damage equal to the spell's level.

**Steady Spellcasting**   If a reaction would disrupt Stirvyn's spellcasting action, he attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

</column>
name: Stirvyn Banyan
